summary: The diff implements comprehensive frontend UI for the Cataloguing Module (REQ-11 through REQ-18) with all required components, forms, search interfaces, and validation logic. However, all backend requirements (REQ-1 through REQ-10) remain unimplemented. The backend file (main.mo) was modified but only contains a comment stating 'OUTDATED: Attribute management features need to be implemented in the next iteration.' None of the required backend data structures, methods, or logic have been implemented.

missing_requirements.requirement: Create backend data structures for Attribute_Master table to store attribute templates imported from Excel files
missing_requirements.reason: Backend main.mo only contains an 'OUTDATED' comment. No Attribute_Master data structure exists.

missing_requirements.requirement: Create backend data structures for Spare_Part_Attributes table to store all attributes for spare parts
missing_requirements.reason: Backend main.mo only contains an 'OUTDATED' comment. No Spare_Part_Attributes data structure exists.

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement backend method to import Excel file containing attribute templates and populate Attribute_Master table
missing_requirements.reason: Backend main.mo does not implement any Excel import method for attribute templates.

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement backend method to retrieve attributes dynamically based on selected noun and modifier values from Attribute_Master
missing_requirements.reason: Backend main.mo does not implement any method to retrieve attributes by noun and modifier.

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement backend method to check if a spare part number already exists and return its current attributes if found
missing_requirements.reason: Backend main.mo does not implement any method to check spare part existence by number with attributes.

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement backend logic to prevent duplicate spare part creation by validating spare part number uniqueness before creation
missing_requirements.reason: Backend main.mo does not implement duplicate validation logic for spare part numbers.

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement backend logic to allow linking the same spare part to multiple equipment records without duplicating the spare part itself
missing_requirements.reason: Backend main.mo does not implement equipment-spare part linking logic with relationship tracking.

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement backend method to auto-generate unique spare part numbers when creating new spare parts
missing_requirements.reason: Backend main.mo does not implement auto-generation logic for spare part numbers.

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement backend logic to auto-generate short descriptions for spare parts based on their attribute values from Spare_Part_Attributes table
missing_requirements.reason: Backend main.mo does not implement description generation logic based on attributes.

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement backend search method supporting advanced filters for Equipment No, Tag No, Spare Part No, Spare Name, Description, Model No, Part Number, and Serial Num
missing_requirements.reason: Backend main.mo does not implement advanced search method with multiple filter parameters.
